author: cbs8
title: Phish New Years Eve Tickets at Madison Square Garden in New York (NY) On Sale Now To The General Public at TicketProcess.com
text:
Phish has made it official that they will play New York City’s Madison Square Garden on the evenings of December 30th through January 2nd. TicketProcess.com has moved quickly to make a large inventory of Phish New Year’s Eve and day New Year’s tickets available now.
(PRWEB) October 02, 2015
The band absolutely dominated the charts and the hearts and minds of young rock fans throughout the 1990s. Phish staked claim to the alternative crowd in the years leading up to the creation of the Internet. Fans who drove through Northern California, Chicago, Tennessee or New York during those years regularly saw the iconic multi-colored Phish bumper stickers.
Phish has played Madison Square Garden over 30 times since their first show in December, 1994. They recently announced four consecutive live concerts, and they will take place during prime days in this year’s New York City winter schedule.
Their 13th studio album was released in 2014, making a Baker's dozen of a huge list that began with a self-entitled album in 1986, which was initially met with mixed reviews. By the time they released Lawn Boy in 1990 and A Picture of Nectar in 1992, they had garnered a momentum significant enough to sell out venues coast-to-coast. This remains the case, although the band will be playing exclusively in Madison Square Garden, and the best tickets can be found at TicketProcess.com
The first Phish Madison Square Garden show will take place on Wednesday, December 30. This will be followed by a New Year’s Eve show on Thursday, December 31. Shows scheduled for Friday, January 1 and Saturday, January 2 are sure to be high-energy events that will have fans in and around New York City buzzing. All fans interested in securing tickets to one of these monumental evenings can find what they're looking for now at TicketProcess.com.
*TicketProcess.com is not associated or otherwise connected in any form with the college or professional organizations, teams, artists, bands or other performers featured on this site. Additionally, TicketProcess.com has no affiliation with any of the venues listed on the site. Names and titles used in this press release are solely for descriptive purposes and do not imply, suggest or indicate that any type of endorsement or partnership is in place.
About TicketProcess.com
Since early in 2010, TicketProcess.com has been a secondary ticket exchange for both brokers and consumers. By offering a large selection of inventory to an array of the most exclusive sports, live concerts, theater events and other live entertainment, they have established their place as a reputable source of quality, guaranteed tickets for fans around the United States and beyond.
Seven-days-a-week customer service combined with a 100% satisfaction guarantee has proved to be a simple yet effective strategy for the constantly growing online secondary ticket market. All fans of live entertainment are openly welcome to visit the easily accessible site and purchase their tickets with the confidence that comes with a proven track record.
Following TicketProcess.com on Facebook, Twitter and Google+ will give you direct access to exclusive announcements and free discount codes, allowing you to access to all possible advantages in terms of purchasing the best ticket at the best possible price.
